2x ddPCR Buffer control for Probes lot #
Water used in qPCR experiments was prepared with diethylpyrocarbonate (DEPC) treated water. 1 mL DEPC was added to 5 L of double distilled water, stirred for 2-3 hours, then autoclaved for 3 hours.
